sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FileText, Download, Share2, User, GraduationCap, Clock, CheckCircle, XCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const StudentDashboard: React.FC = () => { // Mock data const studentInfo = { name: 'Rahul Sharma', studentId: 'STU20230045', course: 'B.Tech in Computer Science', batch: '2020-2024', email: 'rahul.sharma@example.com', phone: '+91 98765 43210', }; const certificates = [ { id: 1, name: 'Bachelor of Technology', type: 'Degree Certificate', issueDate: '2024-05-15', status: 'verified', downloadUrl: '#', }, { id: 2, name: 'Machine Learning Specialization', type: 'Course Completion', issueDate: '2023-12-10', status: 'verified', downloadUrl: '#', }, { id: 3, name: 'Web Development Internship', type: 'Internship Certificate', issueDate: '2023-07-20', status: 'pending', downloadUrl: '#', }, ]; return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {studentInfo.name}!

Access and manage your academic certificates in one place

Student ID
{studentInfo.studentId}
Course
{studentInfo.course}
Batch
{studentInfo.batch}
Email
{studentInfo.email}
Phone
{studentInfo.phone}
{/* Certificates Section */}

My Certificates

View and manage your academic certificates

    {certificates.map((cert) => (

  • {cert.name}

    {cert.type}

    {cert.status === 'verified' && ( Verified )} {cert.status === 'pending' && ( Pending )} {cert.status === 'rejected' && ( Rejected )}

    Issued on {cert.issueDate}

    • ))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default StudentDashboard;
